## âœ… Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have checked for and removed any console.logs or debug code

### Testing

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on real devices (iOS/Android)
- [ ] I have tested edge cases and error scenarios

### Documentation

- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README if needed
- [ ] I have updated comments in the code
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions

### Database/API Changes

- [ ] Database schema changes are documented
- [ ] Migration scripts are included (if applicable)
- [ ] API changes are backward compatible (or breaking changes are documented)
- [ ] Environment variables are documented

### Dependencies

- [ ] I have not introduced new dependencies
- [ ] OR: New dependencies are justified and documented
- [ ] Package.json version is updated (if needed)
- [ ] iOS Pods are updated (if needed)

### Performance

- [ ] I have considered the performance impact of my changes
- [ ] No memory leaks introduced
- [ ] Images are optimized
- [ ] Bundle size impact is minimal

### Security

- [ ] No sensitive data is exposed in logs or UI
- [ ] API keys and secrets are properly secured
- [ ] User input is validated and sanitized
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
